item.title: Use Cases
item.description: Since Velociraptor is a very flexible tool, it can help you in many situations. It is therefore useful to look at some of the common use cases.

item.title: Tutorial
item.description: In this tutorial we will deploy Velociraptor locally to our machine, and connect a client to it. This is the bare minimum required to demonstrate Velociraptor’s capabilities and walk through the GUI. Velociraptor can be used in a number of different ways, but in this tutorial we will use it as an end point visibility tool, collect some artifacts and set up endpoint monitoring. Overview Before we start it is useful to see how a Velociraptor deployment looks at a high level:
